content: pebbles bulky beanie whidbey island has beautiful pebbly beaches if you look carefully you may even find an agate these pebbles inspired this quick and easy beanie great for beach hikes yarn one skein 90 yard of super bulky yarn recommend rasta caracol or whidbey isle bumpy chunky stitch gauge two stitches per inch sizes small/medium 18/20 head size or large/extra large >21 head size needles #15 16 circular needles your choice of 24 circular or dpns for decrease of hat abbreviations bor-­ beginning of round k2tog-­ knit two together pattern with #15 16 needles cast on 40/44 stitches join in round and knit 3 5 inches of 1x1 rib place bor stitch marker and kfb first stitch 41/45 stitches k1/p1 opposite of rib stitches for 2 5 inches knit all stitches until beanie is 9 long decrease rounds k2 k2tog entire row knit entire row x 2 row k1 k2tog entire row knit entire row x 2 row k2tog entire row cut 8 tail thread onto yarn needle and thread through remaining stitches drawing tight weave in ends and block hat copyright whidbey isle yarns coupeville wa whidbeyyarns net do not reproduce without written permission info@whidbeyyarns net #whidbeyisleyarns on instagram whidbey isle yarns on facebook
